reviewText: I think not. Craig Ferguson is simply funny, as long as you don't mind the occasional four-letter-word.Either on TV or on the stage, he is witty and "real". Comedy apparently comes easy to him.
summary: Does This Need To Be Reviewed?
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: his comedy comes from wit, intelligence and the tragedies he has experienced.... he shares his life with us and he is just funny as pick your own disclaimer... i love eddie ... fangirl all the way... he is smart... he is funny ... and he has good taste in clothes for his body type... eddie is always a good time insert your own expletive deletive here...
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Craig Ferguson dishing it out in front of a live audience while he is on tour.  It's so much fun as he cuts on and makes fun of almost everything worth taking about and maybe not !  Lets hear it for good old Craig!!
summary: Does This Need To Be Said ? dvd
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Craig Ferguson is just a funny man.  Not always language friendly for the little folks, but it's okay to have adult thinking humor at times.
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my mom.  She thought it was hilarious.  If you are a fan of his comedy and/or his TV show, you'll be happy with this purchase.
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Yes, yes it does need to be said.  Hilarious!  He jokes about everything.  And who doesn't love his accent?  Better than his previous shows...and those were pretty good, too.
summary: Does this need to be said?
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Craig Ferguson is one of a handful of original-styled comedians. He makes me laugh, he's just too much! The handful of comedians I love and respect are, Craig Ferguson, Ron White, Bill Engval, Dennis Miller... I'm sure there may be a few I have missed but these guys are GREAT and the important thing is they make me laugh and that's a GOOOD THING in this day and age!
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: This is a really funny stand up by Craig Ferguson. You get to see a side of him that you don't on his tv show. He's a really good storyteller (rather than just telling jokes) and comes across as a very likable guy. I enjoyed it very much.
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Ferguson brings his realism and honesty to the stage. His wit is outrageous with a clarity that does not select a specific group, but rather holds a mirror up to our society showing us what is both good and bad about ourselves in a way that helps us laugh. Great video worth seeing again and again.
summary: Great Day for Comedy in America
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: i am a huge fan of craig ferguson.  this stand up routine is very clever.  my family greatly enjoyed watching it again and again.
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: A wild man on the stage and a person I try to watch at night, but the local TV station thinks it more important that we need a half-hour dose/delay of Hollywood glitz and rumors before his show. Funny as they come, almost a stream of thought comedian.
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: He's all grown up and wants to be able to swear when he feels like it.  Too bad he has to pay a quarter each time to do so.  The lessons he's learned he's more'n willing to share.  And you should all follow his advice.
summary: The Man's A [ooh la la] Genius!
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Absolutely a must buy!  Even better than his 1st DVD; he gets funnier everytime I watch him either on TV or his standup shows.  I just think he's great!
summary: Craig Ferguson: Does this need to be said?
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewerName: The Big G. Spot "The Big G. Spot"
reviewText: No OOO LALA's here not even a little flag over the mouth so be ready for full on raw Scotish American Humor Craig is AWESOME!!!
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: This was the first performance of stand-up by Craig Ferguson that I have seen apart from television.  Hilarious!!!  He drops the F-bomb a lot but it's not really gratuitous.  I laughed my ass off!  Seriously, I had to pick it up and glue it back on.  Craig Ferguson has a unique grasp of humor that I've not experienced in decades.  The way he totally deconstructs the whole talk show genre is brilliant.
summary: Everything I could want from Ferguson
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?

reviewText: Brilliant comedy. Simple as that. What can I say more about it? Craig is hilarious and this is just another standup DVD showing how that is true. I still think there should be behind the scenes things on these DVDs... The standup itself and Craig himself are 1000000+ stars. The DVD's features not so much. Still defiantly worth getting! If you're a Craig fan you should already have this. If you like to laugh but aren't a fan... get this, laugh, then become a fan!
summary: I wish there was 100+ stars option....
Title: Craig Ferguson: Does This Need To Be Said?
